excerpt: "A research team led by Dr. Jung ah Lim and Dr. Hyunsu Ju of the Center for Opto-electronic Materials and Devices, KIST, has successfully developed organic neurofiber transistors with an architecture and functions similar to those of neurons in the human brain,"
